service.name: Carer Supplement
service.TODO: dependent on, Carer Allowance, Carer Payment, Wife Pension with Carer Allowance, DVA Partner Service Pension with Carer Allowance, Department of Veterans’ Affairs Carer Service Pension
service.description: Carer Supplement (CS) is an annual payment introduced in June 2009, to assist people with caring responsibilities. The eligibility date was 12 May in 2009 and 1 July from 2010 onwards. The CS replaces the One-Off Carer Bonus paid from 2004 to 2008.

Dimension.name: Carers
Dimension.desc: There are payments and services available if you provide daily care to someone with a severe disability or medical condition or someone who is frail aged.

Dimension.name: Centrelink
Dimension.desc: Delivering a range of payments and services for people at times of major change.

Dimension.name: Human Services
Dimension.desc: We deliver social and health-related payments and services
